main event: A pilot observed a glowing white object making a fast sharp 90Â° turn in the sky in Minnesota on 20 Oct 55.
interesting points: The observation lasted 2-3 seconds. The object had no definite tail. The pilot estimated the object's speed between 1,220 - 1,500 miles per hour., The object appeared at an altitude estimated at 4,980 feet., The object eventually disappeared as it became smaller.
sighted object: a glowing white object in the sky
witness description: Steve William Franklin, 26 years old, male pilot
